global_map_description: Secure connectivity across global locations. Access your network resources from anywhere with reliable performance.
product_showcase_description: A list of currently active for service subscription.
feature_how_desc: Your traffic is packed and obfuscated as ordinary web requests, then cleanly unpacked at exit nodes. This prevents man‑in‑the‑middle tampering and makes it nearly indistinguishable from normal traffic.
feature_smart_desc: The client intelligently splits domestic and international routes to avoid unnecessary costs. You can also choose to proxy all traffic—or none—at any time.
feature_devices_desc: Works across macOS, Windows, and Linux. You can even deploy to your router. Device sessions are limited per plan—upgrade any time for more.
